channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI says it's had to protect its Atlas AI browser against some serious security threats
item.description: Prompt injection might never go away, OpenAI says, as it compares it to phishing.

item.title: Microsoft hails "storage revolution" as it adds native NVMe support to Windows Server 2025
item.description: Windows Server 2025 introduces native NVMe support, boosting storage performance, lowering latency, and improving efficiency for enterprise workloads and servers.

item.title: The Final Episode of ‘Strange New Worlds’ Has Found Its Sulu and Bones
item.description: Kai Murakami and Thomas Jane will play 'Star Trek' legends Hikaru Sulu and Leonard McCoy in the final episode of 'Strange New Worlds'.

item.title: Judge blocks Texas app store age verification law
item.description: A federal judge blocked a Texas law requiring mobile app stores to verify users' ages from taking effect on January 1st. In an order granting a preliminary injunction on the Texas App Store Accountability Act (SB 2420), Judge Robert Pitman wrote that the statute "is akin to a law that would require every bookstore to […]

item.title: Cet écran PC gamer LG bien doté (24″, 120 Hz, FreeSync) coûte moins de 80 € grâce à cette offre
item.description: Avis aux gamers exigeants, mais fauchés en cette fin d'année. Le moniteur gaming LG UltraGear 24G411A-B présente une fiche technique très complète, tout en affichant un prix peu élevé : en ce moment, PC Componentes le propose à 78,35 euros au lieu de 109,99 euros.

item.title: Data Holds the Key in Slowing Age-Related Illnesses
item.description: More accurate and individualized health predictions will allow for preventative factors to be implemented well in advance.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: Why is the Nex Playground 'AI console' such a hit?
item.description: Over the past two years, the Nex Playground has carved out a niche for itself with kids and parents alike. It's a small box that sits in front of your TV and uses a camera, along with computer vision AI processing, to track your movement for interactive games. Think of it like a simplified version of Microsoft's Kinect (RIP), with a bit of the local multiplayer we see from the original Wii. In this bonus episode, we chat with David Lee, Nex's CEO and co-founder, about how he went from building a basketball tracking app to one of the most intriguing gaming console alternatives on the market. (T...

item.title: Why Waymo went down in San Francisco
item.description: For self-driving cars, the human in the loop can’t always answer the phone. Last weekend, a gnarly power outage in San Francisco took out a number of traffic lights, which, in turn, sent a number of self-driving Waymo robotaxis into a sort of fugue state. Instead of driving, some of the Waymos responded to these now-analog intersections by turning on their hazard lights, blocking traffic, and, well, not doing much of anything. There were multiple instances of Waymo cars clogging up roads, turning futuristic technology into glorified bollards. The city quickly asked the company to turn off the...

item.title: The ‘Avatar: The Last Airbender’ Movie Is Skipping Theaters
item.description: 'Legend of Aang' will now debut on streaming, hitting Paramount+ in fall 2026.

item.title: These great digital gifts will arrive just in time for Christmas
item.description: And just like that, Christmas is less than two days away, which is too soon for most items bought online to arrive in time. That said, you aren’t alone if you waited too long to start buying gifts this year, and you definitely aren’t alone in feeling guilty for considering digital gifts instead of something […]

item.title: I've reviewed over a dozen coffee makers this year, and these are my 3 favorites from 2025
item.description: Three outstanding options to help you through the daily grind

item.title: RAM buyers beware — expensive high-end memory kit from Corsair was reportedly swapped for dummy RGB lighting modules
item.description: A buyer returned their 96GB memory kit worth $999 only to receive a replacement that consisted of $35 worth of dummy RGB lighting modules.

item.title: Level up your listening with $39 off the Apple AirPods Pro 3
item.description: As of Dec. 23, get $39 off a pair of Apple AirPods Pro 3 earbuds.

item.description: Merry Christmas, drone enthusiasts!

item.description: Is "The Smashing Machine" streaming yet? Find out how to watch Dwayne Johnson's Mark Kerr biopic.

item.title: How to get your grocery costs down
item.description: Grocery costs are up, so shoppers need to get more savvy.

item.title: NYPD Sued Over Possible Records Collected Through Muslim Spying Program
item.description: The New York Police Department's “mosque-raking” program targeted Muslim communities across NYC. Now, as the city's first Muslim mayor takes office, one man is fighting—again—to fully expose it.

item.title: These are the 6 best Christmas films of all-time according to you, the TechRadar audience
item.description: You voted for your favorite Christmas movies, here are six of the Christmas classics you love to watch.

item.title: Marvel Rivals studio teases a big year ahead for the game — 'We're not going to slow down'
item.description: NetEase Games has confirmed that it has "bigger plans" ahead for Marvel Rivals in 2026 after a successful first year of release, with executive producer Danny Koo teasing new content planned "more than a year ahead".

item.title: Test du SwitchBot AI Art Frame : le cadre photo numérique n’est pas mort, bien au contraire
item.description: On se noie sous les écrans. Du réveil au coucher, c'est une avalanche de rétroéclairage, de notifications… qui nous grille la rétine. SwitchBot, d'habitude connu pour ses petits robots qui appuient sur des interrupteurs à notre place, prend un virage à 180 degrés. Leur promesse avec l'AI Art Frame ? Un écran qui ne ressemble pas à un écran. Pas de fil, pas de lumière, juste de l'encre électronique couleur pour transformer votre mur en galerie d'art dynamique. On l'a testé ! ...

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi un pack Samsung (PC + écouteurs) : Galaxy Book 5 Pro et Galaxy Buds 3 Pro
item.description: Avant-dernier jour du concours et calendrier de l'Avent #FrandroidOffreMoi. Aujourd'hui, c'est Samsung qui est à l'honneur avec un pack PC + écouteurs sans fil.

item.title: Nvidia is reportedly reshuffling its cloud efforts to better combat growing competition
item.description: Nvidia had reportedly scaled back its cloud businesses so as not to take on AWS, Azure and Google Cloud.

item.title: The powerful M5 iPad Pro 11-inch is $100 off at Amazon and it arrives before Christmas
item.description: The 11-inch M5 iPad Pro is on sale at Amazon for $899, down from the list price of $999. That's a 10% discount.

item.title: Safety Panel Calls Out NASA for Downplaying the Boeing Starliner Mess
item.description: The space agency failed to declare the spacecraft's thruster glitch as a mishap, creating confusion and uncertainty.

item.title: US insurance giant Aflac says hackers stole personal and health data of 22.6 million
item.description: Aflac, one of the largest insurance companies in the U.S., confirmed hackers stole reams of personal data, including Social Security numbers, identity documents, and health information.

item.title: What time do stores close on Christmas eve: Shopping hours for Walmart, Target, more
item.description: Trying to squeeze in some last minute holiday shopping? Shop until the very last minute on Christmas Eve. Check out the store hours for Target, Walmart, and more.

item.title: L’excellent Samsung Galaxy A56 accompagné de son éclatante dalle Amoled perd 42 % de son prix
item.description: Le Samsung A56 est un super smartphone de milieu de gamme, notamment grâce à une superbe dalle Amoled. Chez Amazon, il tombe à 289 euros et s'approche des téléphones les plus abordables du marché.

item.title: Forfaits Sosh : ce qu’il faut savoir sur les offres internet et mobiles de l’opérateur low-cost d’Orange
item.description: Sosh est la filiale low-cost d'Orange, elle permet de profiter du réseau de l'opérateur historique à un prix plus accessible et sans engagement. Cette année, Sosh a considérablement modernisé son offre avec notamment l'arrivée d'une box Wi-Fi 7 à bas coût comme ce que fait B&YOU, mais le reste est-il à la hauteur ?

item.title: Droit d’auteur : une nouvelle plainte vise six géants de l’IA aux États-Unis
item.description: Des auteurs ont décidé, outre Atlantique, de porter plainte contre les principales sociétés de l'IA. Comme dans d'autres procédures, les écrivains accusent les géants du secteur d'avoir utilisé des bibliothèques illicites, dans lesquelles se trouvent leurs oeuvres, pour entraîner leurs systèmes. Ce sans autorisation et en violation de leur droit d'auteur, selon ces derniers....

item.title: Les astronomes stupéfaits : la tempête géante de Jupiter oscille comme un bol de gélatine
item.description: La Grande tache rouge de Jupiter est observée par les astronomes depuis au moins 150 ans. Ils ont récemment découvert un comportement tout à fait inattendu grâce au télescope spatial Hubble.

item.title: ‘Anaconda’ Slithers on That Line of So Bad, It’s Good
item.description: Jack Black, Paul Rudd, Steve Zahn, and Thandiwe Newton star in the meta comedy remake, out Christmas Day.

item.title: The Cyber Monday Kindle Unlimited deal is back: get 3 months for 99 cents
item.description: Get three months of Kindle Unlimited for only 99 cents and save nearly $35 on loads of books.

item.title: This founder just landed funding for a second go at the same problem: Affordable custom home design
item.description: Drafted is now nearly five months old, and it's everything Atmos wasn't.

item.title: Here are the best live service games to spend the Holiday season in, from Fortnite’s cozy Winterfest to the snow-covered hills of Arc Raiders
item.description: It's time to settle into the various Holiday events currently running in live service games. Here's my picks for the 6 best that are worth your time over Christmas.

item.title: Prime members can claim loads of free games in latest Amazon giveaway including one of the best PC strategy games ever
item.description: Amazon Prime members shouldn't miss the current deluge of free games available with Luna.

item.title: Consuming news from AI shifts our opinions and reality. Here’s how
item.description: Proponents of AI regulation often cite neutral AI as a goal, but true neutrality is often unattainable. Meta’s decision to end its professional fact-checking program sparked a wave of criticism in the tech and media world. Critics warned that dropping expert oversight could erode trust and reliability in the digital information landscape, especially when profit-driven platforms are mostly left to police themselves....

item.title: Anaconda review: Jack Black and Paul Rudd deliver a surprising comedy — but its a bad surprise
item.description: Paul Rudd and Jack Black star in Kevin Etten and Tom Gormican's remake of "Anaconda." Review.

item.title: Cuffing season is here! The best dating apps for serious relationships, reviewed.
item.description: The best dating apps for people looking for a long-term relationship.

item.title: Voici le meilleur smartphone de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Parmi les modèles testés par Frandroid, le Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra se distingue en recevant le prix du meilleur smartphone de 2025 lors des Frandroid Awards avec Delos. Voici pourquoi.

item.title: Marissa Mayer’s new startup Dazzle raises $8M led by Forerunner’s Kirsten Green
item.description: Mayer launched Dazzle after shuttering her photo and contact management startup Sunshine. Green’s investment suggests Dazzle is poised for the coming wave of new AI-infused consumer businesses.

item.title: Cyberattaque La Poste : des hackers prorusses revendiquent la paralysie des services
item.description: Alors que les services en ligne de La Poste reviennent péniblement à la normale ce mardi, une piste se dessine sur l'identité des assaillants. Le groupe de cybercriminels prorusses « NoName057(16) » a revendiqué l'attaque sur les réseaux sociaux. Une information à prendre avec précaution, qui n'a pas été confirmée par l'entreprise publique.

item.title: Last-minute gifts on sale thatll arrive before Christmas: DoorDash gift cards, Fire Sticks, the Shark Glossi, more
item.description: Scrambling for a gift that'll arrive by Dec. 25? We found Amazon deals from Keurig, Apple, Shark, and more with same-day delivery.

item.title: Trump’s War on Offshore Wind Is a Gut Punch to the AI Boom
item.description: U.S. electricity consumption is growing for the first time in a decade l due to AI, so why are we stunting renewable energy development?

item.title: FCC bans foreign drones, including DJI. What happens next.
item.description: The U.S. just banned foreign drone makers like DJI. What happens to your DJI drone now?
